poem:
Title: On Veiled Truths

In Gaza, shadowed horrors lurk.
Cries, caught in the weft of 
jaundiced newsprint -
Netanyahu draws scarlet curtains 
over Al Jazeera.

Israel whispers in red, 
a deception of silence.
But truth - a stubborn sunbeam,
cracks through the sable dawn.
Beneath the minister's quill,
a rapid tool against liberty's scales. 

Even barred eyes see-
Reality persists.
